name: > DISPLAYED INFO <
description: Settings that affect what and how statistics are displayed.

name: Stats Type:
description: Select your prefered way to display the gameplay statistics.

name: Extra Stats
description: Shows additional information. (such as sicks, goods, etc.)

name: Etterna-Styled Time Bar
description: If checked, the style of information displayed on the Time Bar will be similar to the Time Bar from the game Etterna.

name: > VISUALS <
description: Settings, related to the visual part of the UI.

name: Health Bar Gradient
description: If checked, replaces the Health Bar sprite with the gradient version.

name: Time Bar Gradient
description: If checked, replaces the Time Bar sprite with the gradient version.

name: Colored Text
description: If checked, most text elements in the HUD will be colorized.

name: Time Bar Icons
description: If unchecked, hides all icons near the Time Bar.

name: Replace Combo Counter
description: If checked, removes FNF's combo counter pop-outs and replaces them with the SaraHUD version.

name: Lane Underlay:
description: How transparent should the Lane Underlay be.

name: Opponent Underlay
description: If checked, adds Lane Underlay for the opponent.

name: > TECHNICAL <
description: Settings, related to the technical part of the UI and do not affect it's visuals in any way.

name: Check for Updates
description: If unchecked, removes the Psych Engine version check.
